body.name: PHYEX 18” Push Broom with Adjustable Long Handle, Multi-Surface Floor Scrub Brush for Cleaning Deck, Patio, Garage, Driveway
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 7 mins
features: DUAL-FILL BRISTLES - The combination of stiff & soft bristles made this broom gathers dirt and dust easily. Soft longer bristles get the small stuff and the stiffer inner bristles move the bigger things easily.
ANGLED THREADED BROOM JOINT - It is another advantage of sweeping efficiency. This means that the broom does not have to be tilted when brushing and all bristles are in full contact with the floor.
ADJUSTABLE HANDLE - The stainless steel handle can be removed and attached, total length is 47".
CLEANING LARGE AREA - Due to its 18-inch width it sweeps up the yard in half the time. There is nothing to worry about the dust will rising in clouds in daily use.
VARIOUS APPILICATIONS - Suitable for cleaning garden, deck, patio, garage, driveway and much more indoor/outdoor surfaces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PHYEX Push Broom Indoor & Outdoor Use Details: Broom material: Flagged bristle Handle material: Stainless steel Two different bristles: Softer longer outside bristle for sweeping small stuff like dust,detritus; Siffer inside bristle for collecting larger stull like leaves, pebbles. Five row bristle: The broom head is finished with five row bristles to sweep heavy duty stuff. Broom angle: 45 degree for convenient sweeping Two screw head option Height: Two deifferent height option

Two Different Height Option There are two different handle heights to different people to use, 47 inches and 55 inches. When you use, no matter child or adult, it’s easy to handle and sweeping. A suitable height can save your back well!

PHYEX broom head, 18 inches wide, can sweep up the yard or deck in half time. Wider broom collects pebbles, soil, dust, leaves and other stuff efficiently, save your effort and time! The garden brush is designed with 45 degree between broom head and stainless steel handle, easy to handle and no nedd to bend but bristles are all in full contact with floor . There are also two threaded holes to contact handle. If one side bristles are wearing unevenly, you can swap the other side. PHYEX push broom brush head are made of two different bristles. The green bristles are softer and longer for sweeping small stuff like soil, dust and detributes. The black bristles are stiffer and shorter for collecting large garbages like leaves, pebbles, branches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Mobile Broom!
reviews.reviewText: I climb roofs and sweep them, so I needed a good sturdy broom that could be broken down to fit into a normal-sized backpack. This fit the bill, so I purchased it. A few roofs later, I can say this broom assembles easily, disassembles easily, is lightweight, and very sturdy.One thing you may want to address is that when using the broom, it's possible for the handle to be come unscrewed. This can be easily solved with some tape, or just being careful. So far it hasn't been a real issue for the light-duty roof sweeping I do, but I can see how it might bother someone doing a heavier-duty job.Highly recommended as a sturdy, lightweight, easy-to-transport broom for general use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: OK, so it's a broom. The handle is WAY too short for me (I'm only 5'9"). The handle also feels very weak, like if I push too hard it'll bend. The actual broom head itself works great...UPDATE 9/13/2022: Apparently someone from the company read my email. They sent me not only a longer handle but the ENTIRE broom. The longer handle was much easier to use and seems sturdier. FANTASTIC customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Strong bristles. Adjustable handle shorter than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price very good. Even though the head is not wide you can scrub with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good broom, but design flaw...
reviews.reviewText: The broom itself is great. The fact that the broom head screws onto the pole makes it great for compact shipping, but it isn’t practical for everyday use because it comes loose while sweeping, making you have to stop every so often to tighten the head back to the pole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Broom of A Lifetime
reviews.reviewText: Excellent broom! I bought this one because of the stainless steel handle, since my other cheaper metal handle broom broke (go figure); let me tell you—it’s HEFTY and heavy, but I wouldn’t change a thing! It DOES have a bit of a learning curve, but once you get the hang of it, it’s very efficient. Because of the wide, angled head, it sweeps everything up in the first go! The bright lime green colored bristles and the shiny steel make me and my broom closet very happy 😊At the end of the day, it’s a broom, but if you have to get one, this is the one to have for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great broom and is easy to store. It is a little shorter than I thought but I did see the reviews about that and honestly I don’t mind anyway. It does what it needs to do!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used for outside patio
reviews.reviewText: The broom is definitely heavy duty but it was easy to assemble. I use it for washing my patio in spring when the pollen absolutely takes over everything! However the handle can sometimes twist off if you’re not careful, but overall this is a very durable broom and will be used for many seasons to come!
